attributes.action: ask Her Majesty the Queen to dissolve Parliament immediately and call a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the publication of MPs expense details we, the people of the United Kingdom, have lost confidence in the ability of our Members of Parliament to govern our nation in the manner in which we expect. We petition the government to dissolve Parliament and call a general election in which we can make our voice heard and our opinion of the manner in which our elected representatives have conducted themselves known.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
